news.title: Core wholesale prices rose 0.8% in January, much more than expected
news.summary: No description available. No description available for this model. For more information on this model, please visit: www.cruiseworld.com/cruisemodel.

news.title: OpenAI closes $110 billion funding round with backing from Amazon, Nvidia, Softbank
news.summary: OpenAI's latest funding round is even bigger than its prior financing, which was a record amount for private tech companies. OpenAI is a AI company that aims to improve the quality of the world's information.

news.title: Netflix ditches deal for Warner Bros. Discovery after Paramount’s offer is deemed superior
news.summary: Netflix is ditching a deal to buy Warner Bros. Discovery's studio and streaming assets. WBD board deemed a revised bid by Paramount to be superior.

news.title: Block shares soar as much as 24% as company slashes workforce by nearly half
news.summary: Block said Thursday it's laying off more than 4,000 employees, or about half of its head count. Block: "We are going through a very difficult time in our business"

news.title: Anthropic CEO Amodei says Pentagon's threats 'do not change our position' on AI
news.summary: Anthropic said its negotiations with the DOD are still ongoing. Anthropic is working with the Defense Department on a new contract to build a new facility.

news.title: Wholesale prices rise sharply and point to persistent inflation — but there’s glimmers of hope
news.summary: Cost of wholesale goods and services rose at an accelerated pace in January for the second month in a row. Persistent inflation could dog the economy at least through the early part of the new year.

news.title: Is it OK to wear pajamas on your next flight? A viral post sparks debate.
news.summary: Tampa International Airport issued a mock ban on sleepwear. Plenty of comments soon followed on social media. The airport has since issued an apology for the incident.

news.title: FanDuel parent’s stock tumbles as the house just can’t seem to win for its investors
news.summary: FanDuel's users lost too many bets and left for competitors. Shares of FanDuel’s parent were pointing down after disappointing earnings.

news.title: ‘I spend $7,500 a month’: I’m 47, earn $260K, and have $3 million. Can I retire at 50?
news.summary: “I own a home worth $520,000 and do not have a mortgage on it,” she says. “I’m not going to let that get in the way of my dreams.”

news.title: Beware of banks breaking bad, warns top B. of A. strategist. He casts a wary eye on bank-loan ETFs.
news.summary: Problem loans in the financial-services sector imply mounting risks for markets. Problem loans in financial- services sector imply rising risks for market.
